txt.en: 'You are here to help with the preparations for tonight's feast? Ah! We shall make the night glow with lantern-light.\n\n'The lanterns line the path on the other side of this gate. When night falls, I would like you to light them for me.'
'Have you finished lighting the lanterns along the path yet?'
'Anyone here could find their way here blindfolded, but the lanterns are an ancient tradition that brings us comfort in dark times.'
Maliriel has asked you to help her companions finish the prepartions for the upcoming banquet.

There are lanterns along the path between Imlad Lalaith and Caras Galadhon. Wait for night fall, and then light them to help lead revellers to the feast.\n\nAs part of the preparations for the evening feast, Galhíril would like you to light the lanterns that will lead the evening revellers to the banquet.
Talk to Galhíril at Imlad Lalaith
Galhíril is at Imlad Lalaith.\n\nYou should return to Galhíril with your report.
